1111011010000101 1011000100101001 1 -> sum: 1010011110101111, cout: 1
1010000000010111 0101011010010000 1 -> sum: 1111011010101000, cout: 0

1101001101011011 0111011000100001 0 -> sum: 0100100101111100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
